          <title>
            <string language="hu">Bécsi Genezis.</string>
            <string language="en">Genesis from Vienna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entstehungsgeschichte von Wien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Genèse de Vienne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Genesis de Viena</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Genesi da Vienna</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Génesis de Viena</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az ószövetségi Ábrahám történetének ábrázolása.</string>
            <string language="en">Representing Abraham's story in the Old Testament</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Biblia,  Teremtés könyve,  Genezis,  Ábrahám,  Rebeka,  nimfa,  hellenisztikus,  pergamen,  bíbor,  Józsue,  Jerikó,  Róma, Vatikán,  </string>
            <string language="en">Bible, Genesis,Abraham, Rebecca, nymph, Hellenistic, parchment, purple, Iosue, Jericho, Rome Vativan</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellen von von Geschichte Abrahams im alten 
Testament</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Représentation de l'histoire d'Abraham dans le 
vieux testament</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Representando a história de Abraham no testament 
velho</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rappresentare storia del Abraham nel vecchio 
Testamento</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντιπροσώπευση της ιστορίας του Abraham στην παλαιά 
διαθήκη</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Representación de la historia de Abraham en el 
viejo testamento</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bibel, Entstehungsgeschichte, Abraham, Rebecca, Nymphe, 
Hellenistic, Pergament, Purple, Iosue, Jericho, Rom Vativan</string>
